tabs.Overview:
Romel Campbell is one of the central characters of [[tboah]] and a member of [[e-class]]. Romel is a very quiet but often serious kid. Due to the weak nature of his ability, Romel developed an insecurity complex and would often spend his time finding ways to grow stronger.

[[toc]]

# Appearance
Romel is an average height kid with a nice and clean hair, parted side ways in the side.

# Personality
A quiet and serious kid, but when it comes to the stuff he likes, Romel can be quite talkative. He is also an earnest and very sincere guy, stemming from having grown in a good family.

# Abilities
- **Sticky Hands** - Initially only capable of making chemicals in his skin which lets him stick to things, Ethan taught him chemistry which allowed him to discover his ability is actually Chemical Synthesis. Ethan then created for him a gauntlet which allows him to store chemicals for him to use. Ethan also added a lighter inside of it, allowing Romel to create explosions. He then learned hand-to-hand combat from a trainer.
- **Chemical Synthesis** - The ability to synthesize any chemicals with known formulas.
